programs.robotics_description: Learn to build and program robots in a fun and easy way.
programs.programming_description: Explore coding by creating games and animations with Scratch.

location_part1: At Robotiks, we believe that every child in Algeria should have the opportunity to explore the wonders of technology, no matter where they are.
location_part2: That's why we've established our schools in all 58 wilayas across the country.
location_part3: Whether you're in the bustling streets of Algiers or the serene landscapes of Tamanrasset, there's a Robotiks school nearby, ready to inspire the next generation of tech-savvy innovators. Our nationwide presence ensures that every child has access to our hands-on, engaging learning experiences, making technology simple, fun, and accessible to all.

roboticsText: Robotics for kids is an exciting, hands-on learning experience that introduces children to the world of technology and engineering. Through building and programming robots, kids develop critical skills like problem-solving, creativity, and teamwork while having fun. They learn the basics of coding, mechanics, and electronics in an engaging and playful environment, sparking curiosity and fostering a passion for innovation. Robotics education empowers children to understand and shape the technology-driven future, making complex concepts simple and enjoyable for young minds.
ProgrammingText: Programming is the art of creating instructions that tell computers how to perform tasks. It helps kids learn logical thinking, problem-solving, and creativity by designing their own games, apps, or animations. Through programming, children gain a deeper understanding of technology, empowering them to build and shape the digital world around them.
AiProgramText: AI for kids introduces young learners to the exciting world of artificial intelligence, where machines learn from data to make decisions. Through interactive activities and simple projects, kids explore how AI powers everyday technology, like virtual assistants or smart games. This fun approach helps them understand the basics of machine learning and problem-solving, inspiring curiosity and creativity in building the future.
BusinessProgramText: Business for kids teaches the basics of entrepreneurship, money management, and creative thinking in a fun and engaging way. Through activities like starting a mini business or creating a simple product, kids learn how to solve problems, set goals, and work as a team. This introduction helps them understand the value of innovation, decision-making, and leadership, sparking an entrepreneurial mindset early on.
